aa880382-56c4-4dcb-821b-4d1c32624e43.description: What do learning designers need to learn and unlearn? This program will help give you an understanding of collaborative online learning and help you think about ways to incorporate it into your learning world. Intrepid’s learning experience design experts and other industry leaders share their thoughts, as well as ask you for your thoughts, ideas, and experiences. Join hundreds of learning designers here to collaborate, share, and learn from others.
aa880382-56c4-4dcb-821b-4d1c32624e43.name: Design for Collaboration 2022

badge_template_activities.title: A 3-week introduction to collaborative online learning in a collaborative online learning environment where you'll hear from Intrepid’s learning experience design experts and other industry leaders.

Share and collaborate with instructional designers, learning architects, learning experience designers, etc. who want to expand their career horizons. Learn insights from the community by discussing topics like what learning designers need to learn and unlearn.

Learn about the neuroscience of learning and the AGES model to help you design collaborative learning that really resonates. Learn new tools to help you create learning experiences that move learners forward.

Think about what collaboration currently looks like in your organization, then share your challenge with others and take back what you need in order to make online collaborative learning part of your learning ecosystem.

b2cc1702-c21f-4daa-b4c0-123c920657ca.description: What do learning designers need to learn and unlearn? Join hundreds of learning designers here to collaborate, share, and learn from others.

2f4a9233-ed9a-4de7-83cb-b6543137ec6a.description: Intrepid by VitalSource awarded this badge for successfully completing Intrepid’s Digital Learning Experience Design eight week course, in which the recipient designed and built a learning experience using Intrepid’s social and collaborative platform.

6397249b-d5a1-4f03-8de5-acc6aafa30c1.description: The Intrepid Momentum Awards is a virtual awards show to recognize the best and most creative learning design happening in the Intrepid community. Its an awards show that focuses on the items that really make learning impactful and the talented Intrepid users who make it happen. Its also an opportunity to share and get inspired by the passion that goes into the work, the creativity that goes into the learner experiences, and the impressive results that showcase success!

4a05e000-01a6-456a-8f15-1bcd3167c818.description: Comprehensive Selling Skills is a consultative sales training program that provides sales professionals with the critical skills they need to become high performers. This program is built on the premise that buying decisions always involve two sides – your customer’s purchase process and your sales process – and trains sales professionals to apply the appropriate selling skills and techniques to advance customers through their purchase process.
4a05e000-01a6-456a-8f15-1bcd3167c818.name: ABM Comprehensive Selling Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed SRG’s Comprehensive Selling Skills program. This sales training program is delivered through a collaborative learning experience including expert facilitation, real-world selling assignments, group collaboration, quizzes, and client-focused projects.
Participated in instructor led training or an online collaborative learning experience, including instructor-led reinforcement sessions and discussion groups.
Demonstrated the application of key selling skills through real client opportunities.

9e440011-1083-4a1d-9d29-cd835607b5f4.description: Project Bonfire awarded this badge for successful completion of the Applied Curiosity course, in a 3-week online blended-learning environment. Earners of this badge understand how curiosity works, how to better apply it in their role at work, and how to impact their organization to create a culture of curiosity.
9e440011-1083-4a1d-9d29-cd835607b5f4.name: Applied Curiosity

657a0b08-a558-4234-a1ab-3ca1b47933f0.description: Project Bonfire awarded this badge for successful completion of the Essential Leadership Skills course – which focuses on building a leadership practice for those with a technical background – in a 4-week online blended-learning environment. 7b5e21ec-c71e-43a1-ad8f-0bce1eae0efa.description: High-Impact Sales Coaching is a sales coaching program that equips sales managers with the skills, knowledge, and tools they need to maximize the sales performance of their teams. In this program, sales managers learn how to develop a collaborative coaching culture, create customized coaching plans, follow a 5-step coaching process, and appropriately allocate coaching time.
7b5e21ec-c71e-43a1-ad8f-0bce1eae0efa.name: High-Impact Sales Coaching

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed SRG’s High-Impact Sales Coaching program. This sales coaching program highly interactive workshop that incorporates scenario-based learning, exercises, and role-plays.
Participated in instructor led training or an online collaborative learning experience, including videos, instructor-led reinforcement sessions, and discussion groups.
Demonstrated the application of key coaching skills through real opportunities with their team.

3ecc7eaa-ce00-439c-905c-0a05d2adf633.description: Participants who earned this badge completed a multi-month learning program on HR business partnering, working with business leaders to develop talent and workforce-related solutions that enable meeting business outcomes. Throughout the experience, participants identified a real business issue, and through methods such as Human-Centered Design, root cause analysis, prototyping, and piloting, developed and successfully implemented solutions in partnership with business leaders.
3ecc7eaa-ce00-439c-905c-0a05d2adf633.name: HRBP Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed Deloitte’s HR Professional Academy of HR Business Partners;  A 16-module program which includes completing a project and working through on-demand learning content, weekly assignments, and discussions.
Effectively defined a business issue and designed, developed, tested, and deployed a solution.
Presented a final report on the solution, including a plan for future deployments and continuous improvement.

e77d5ed2-eb57-4a22-af8d-4716061cfe69.description: Instructors facilitated a multi-month learning program on HR business partnering, guiding participants to work with business leaders to develop talent and workforce-related solutions that enable meeting business outcomes. Instructors also coached participants to identify a real business issue and use Human-Centered Design to conduct root cause analysis, prototyping, and piloting to develop and successfully implement solutions in partnership with business leaders.
e77d5ed2-eb57-4a22-af8d-4716061cfe69.name: HR Professional Academy Master Facilitator

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully facilitated Deloitte’s HR Professional Academy of HR Business Partners;  A 16-module program which includes completing a project and working through on-demand learning content, weekly assignments, and discussions

9cee213a-43e6-402d-933a-96317cbcab6f.description: Selling to Key Executives is an advanced sales training program that provides sales professionals, including account executives and managers, with the insights, strategies, and tactics they need to sell to key executives. This engaging workshop is built upon the executive RAMP model (Research, Access, Meet, Propose), a four-step process that equips sales professionals to sell to the executive-level buyer successfully.
9cee213a-43e6-402d-933a-96317cbcab6f.name: Selling to Key Executives

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed SRG’s Selling to Key Executives six-week course, a collaborative learning experience including weekly missions, quizzes, and client-focused projects.
Participated in live, instructor-led weekly cohort sessions and/or discussion forums to maximize collaboration and learning experience.

Demonstrated the application of key skills through the completion of an Executive RAMP (Research, Access, Meet, Propose) Planner, used to prepare for and execute successful meetings with key executives.

3df08b39-fb57-4ec4-8323-b7fcf29e5c83.description: Project Bonfire awarded this badge for successful completion of the Innovator’s Journey course, in a 5-week online blended-learning environment. Earners of this badge have gained an understanding of innovation fundamentals, practicing problem reframing and visual mapping to identify opportunity spaces – focused on the end goal of improving the way they deliver value to their organization.
3df08b39-fb57-4ec4-8323-b7fcf29e5c83.name: The Innovator's Journey

8151f70f-ab3d-415c-a5e0-ea5c24174a0f.description: THRIVE is a digital learning experience designed to develop critical leadership capabilities at all levels and help leaders thrive both now and in the future. Throughout the experience, participants are guided through a structured human-centered innovation process to accelerate a priority business challenge of their choosing. As participants move through the process, they are challenged to think, act, and react differently - reflecting on, and developing, their own leadership capabilities.
8151f70f-ab3d-415c-a5e0-ea5c24174a0f.name: THRIVE: Leadership, Future-Proofed

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed the THRIVE digital leadership accelerator, including on-demand learning content, weekly assignments, and peer group discussions.
Participated in up to six live virtual sessions hosted by Deloitte leadership experts.
Completed THRIVE Challenge Process, solving a key business challenge by thinking, acting, and reacting in new ways.
Enhanced leadership acumen in the ability to push boundaries, embrace uncertainty, and bring out the best in others.
